cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset bug causes network crashes with Android devices.
Router stops broadcasting on 2.4 GHz and requires frequent reboots.
cont.entity_b: Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments. Mixed mode only works at 11Mbps.

cont.entity_a: Easily modify firmware to include a VPN. Flashable with DD-WRT for secure network configuration. Firmware updates don't resolve Wi-Fi dropping issues.
cont.entity_b: Frequent firmware updates needed to resolve issues.

cont.entity_a: Handles traffic from multiple computers without complaint.
Web interface is easy to navigate.
Economical alternative to expensive flash routers.
Good Wi-Fi coverage in a large house.
Customer service provided a replacement product.

Reboot.comm: Constant reboots required for stable operation.

cont.entity_a: Requires reboot every hour to maintain functionality. Frequent reboots needed for stable operation.
Setup wizard has issues with static WAN links. Setup is difficult with Linksyssmartwifi.
Router overheats due to lack of cooling fan.
Security issues with unauthorized WAN traffic. Router is not password protected.
Router drops internet frequently, affecting smart devices.
VPN feature supported but requires disabling cell phone VPN during setup.
cont.entity_b: VPN feature does not work well. VPN functionality is limited and poorly supported. QuickVPN feature is not intuitive.
Router frequently crashes even with latest firmware. Router crashes when setting time zone.
